about_the_game:
EVERY LIFE MATTERS


Control the Boston riots and don’t let the Miami summer festival get out of hand. Handle EVENTS in the Free Game mode. Use the new REINFORCEMENTS function that will let you summon new units during your duty. Take advantage of two new vehicles and two new pieces of equipment designed especially for the new events.

NEW CHALLENGES


Enraged protesters in Boston flock to the streets because of police actions. How will you handle the criticism aimed at the police forces?

During a summer festival thousands of party goers arrive in the city. Not all of them intend to obey the law. Will you manage to keep the peace?

Check out these two new cities in the career mode and deal with unique events. These events will also appear in any city in the Free Game mode.

NEW POSSIBILITIES


The REINFORCEMENTS function helps you deal with critical moments by letting you summon additional units.

Add new equipment such as pepper spray and riot gear to prepare your units for new challenges.

Use two new vehicles: the prison van, which lets you transport a large number of suspects, and the water cannon, to help you quickly put down riots.

FULL CONTENTS OF THE EVERY LIFE MATTERS DLC:


  • New REINFORCEMENTS function which lets you summon additional units during your duty
  • Four special EVENTS during the Free Game mode (including a festival, a riot and an earthquake)
  • Two new cities for the career mode: Miami and Boston
  • 12 new conversations
  • 18 new reports
  • Two new pieces of equipment: pepper spray and riot gear
  • Two new vehicles: the prison van and the water cannon

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Default
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16
  • Processor: 2x 2Ghz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Default
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: Intel Core I3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Sound Card: Neccessary
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel Core I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris
  • Sound Card: Neccessary

name: 911 Operator - Every Life Matters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mb
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Neccessary
  • Additional Notes: This game is simple :)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 Mb
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Neccessary
